data.title: It is all about wipro. it talks about history.
data.meta_description: It is all about wipro. it talks about history. - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. INTRODUCTION Wipro Limited, headquartered in Bangalore, India, is a leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company. Established in 1945 by Mohamed Premji, Wipro initially began as a manufacturer of vegetable and refined oils, eventually diversifying into various sectors before becoming a prominent player in the IT industry. The company has been at the forefront of technological advancements, harnessing emerging technologies like artificial intelligence, machine learning, data analytics, cloud computing, cybersecurity.

3. WIPRO BUSINESS MODEL IT Services and Consulting: Offers a wide array of IT solutions, including application development, cybersecurity, and cloud services to businesses globally. Industry-focused Solutions: Tailors specialized solutions for various sectors like healthcare, finance, retail, and manufacturing, understanding their distinct needs. Global Delivery Model: Operates through a global network of delivery centers to deliver cost- effective and high-quality services worldwide. Client-Centric Approach: Focuses on building long-term relationships by understanding and addressing client needs efficiently. Business Process Services: Provides outsourcing services in areas like customer support, finance, HR, and supply chain management to streamline operations for clients.

4. WIPRO PRODUCTS Wipro HOLMES: An AI and automation platform that assists enterprises in automating processes, improving productivity, and enabling intelligent decision- making. Wipro VirtuaDesk™: A desktop virtualization solution that enables secure and flexible access to applications and data from any device. Wipro Peripherals: The company offers various peripherals such as printers, scanners, and other computer accessories. Software Products Wipro Desktops and Laptops: Wipro manufactures and sells desktop computers, laptops, and other hardware devices for personal and enterprise use. Hardware Products

5. Wipro Consumer Care and Lighting (WCCLG):- Consumer care Products • Personal Care: Skincare, haircare, and personal hygiene products. • Home Care: Household cleaning, hygiene, and laundry care products Lighting Products • Residential Lighting: LED bulbs, fixtures, and decorative lighting for homes. • Commercial and Industrial Lighting: Lighting solutions for commercial spaces and industries.

6. Wipro Other Products • Aerospace • Banking • High Tech • Insurance • Media • Retail • Telecom Equipment • Utilities • Automotive • Healthcare • Manufacturing Service Products • Analytical management • BPO • Consulting Service • Product Engineering Services • Mobility • Cloud Services • Eco Energy • Infrastructure Management Services

7. Wipro Locations In India Bangalore, Karnataka Chennai, Tamil Nadu Hyderabad, Telangana Pune, Maharashtra Gurgaon, Haryana Noida, Uttar Pradesh Kokata, West Bengal

8. REVENUE Segment-wise Breakdown: Revenue sources include IT services, digital transformation, and consulting/business process services. WIPRO Total Revenue: Wipro reported approximately $1100 crores USD in total revenue. Geographical Distribution: Revenue generated from North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, India, and other global regions.

10. Competitors Tata Consultancy Services (TCS): Major rival in IT services, competing across various domains globally. Infosys: Competitor providing IT services, consulting, and business solutions worldwide. Accenture: Global consulting and professional services firm, offering similar technology solutions. IBM Services: Competes with Wipro in diverse IT services and enterprise solutions. Cognizant Technology Solutions: Provides IT, digital, consulting, and operations services in competition with Wipro. Capgemini: Competitor offering consulting, technology, and professional services worldwide.
